nodes.text:
The Anterab was a BFF-1 bulk freighter used by the Galactic Empire during the "Arms Race". The Anterab and the Degathem were delivering supplies critical for
the development of the TIE Defender starfighter. Despite
Rebel attempts to end the phase by raiding the
Imperial research station, both freighters completed their mission and
delivered the supplies, thanks to an escort of four assault gunboats led by imperial pilot Maarek Stele.
